sections.text: a~ggirasO̍ vai satramAsata|̍ tEśhAqM pRuśnir-GarmadhugA̍sIt|̍ sarjIśhEṇAjIvat|̍ tE̱&bruvann| kasmai nu satramA̱smahE| yE̱&syA OśhadhIrna̍ janayAma̍ iti|̍ tE divO vRuśhTi-masRujanta|̍ yAvantaH̍ stOkA avApadyanta|̍ tAvatIrOśha̍dhayO̍ &jAyanta| | tA jAqtAH pitarO# viśhEṇAlimpann|̍ 1 (10)

tAsA̱M jagdhvA rupyantyait| tE̱&bruvann| ka idamittha-makariti̍|̍ vayaM BAgadhEya̍-micCamA̍nAq̍ iti# pitarO̱&bruvann| kiM ~MvO# BAgadhEyamiti|̍ agnihOtra Eva nO&pyastvitya-bruvann|̍ tEBya# Etad-BAgadhEyaM̍ prAyacCann|̍ yaddhutvA nimArśhTi|̍ tatO vai ta OśhadhIra-svadayann|̍ | ya EvaM ~MvEda|̍ 2 (10)

svadantE&smAq̍ OśhadhayaH|̍ tE vathsamu-pAvAsRujann|̍ idaM nO# havyaM pradApayEti̍|̍ sO̱&bravIdvaraM̍ ~MvRuṇai| daśa# mAq rAtrI̱rjAqtaM na dOhann|̍ Aqsa~ggavaM mAqtrA saha carAqṇIti̍|̍ tasmA̱d-vathsaM jAqtaM daśa rAtrIrna duhanti|̍ Aqsa~ggavaM mAqtrA saha carati|̍ vArEvRutaṅqhya̍sya|̍ tasmA̱d-vathsaṃ saṃsRuśhTadhayaṃ̍ rudrO GAtukaH̍ ( )| ati hi sandhAM dhayati|̍ | 3 (11) 2. 1. 2 anuvAkaM 2 - agnihOtranirUpaṇam

prajApati-ragni-ma̍sRujata|̍ taM prajA anvasRujyanta|̍ tamaBAqga̍ upA̱sta| sO̱&sya prajABi-rapA̱krAmat| tamavaruru̍th-samAqnO&nvai̱t|̍ tamavarudhaM̍ nAśaknOt|̍ sa tapO# &tapyata| sO̱&gni-rupAramatAtA̍pi̍ vai sya prajApatiriti̍|̍ sa rarATAqdudamRuśhTa|̍ 4 (9)

tad-GRutamaBavat|̍ tasmAqdyasya# dakśhiṇataH kEśAq unmRuśhTAH|̍ tAM jyE̱śhThalakśhmI prAjApatyEtyA̍huH|̍ yad-rarATAdudamRu̍śhTa|̍ tasmA̱d-rarATE kEśAq na santi|̍ tadagnau prAgRuhṇAt|̍ tadvyacikithsat|̍ juhavAqnI(3) mA hauśhA(3)miti|̍ tad-vicikithsAyai̍ janma|̍ | ya EvaM ~MvidvAn. vicikithsa̍ti|̍ 5 (10)

vasIya̍ Eva cEtayatE|̍ | taM ~MvAgaByavada-jjuhudhIti̍|̍ sO̱&bravIt| kastvamasIti|̍ svaiva tE vAgityabravIt|̍ sO&juhOth-svAhEti̍|̍ tathsvAhAkAqrasya̍ janma|̍ | ya Evaṅ svAhAkAqrasya̍ janma vEda|̍ karOti# svAhAkAqrEṇa# vIrya̱m| | yasyaivaM ~MviduśhaH̍ svAhAkAqrEṇa juhvati|̍ 6 (10)

BOgAyaivAsya̍# hutaM Bavati|̍ | tasyAq Ahutyai̍ puruśha-masRujata|̍ dvitIya-majuhOt|̍ sO&śva-masRujata|̍ tRutIya-majuhOt|̍ sa gAmasRujata|̍ caturtha-majuhOt|̍ sO&vimasRujata|̍ pa~jcama-majuhOt|̍ sO&jAma̍sRujata|̍ 7 (10)

sO̱&gni-rabiBEt|̍ AhutIBirvai̍ mA̱&&pnOtIti|̍ sa prajApatiM̍ punaH prAviśat|̍ taM prajApati-rabravIt|̍ jAyasvEti|̍ sO̱&bravIt| kiM BAgadhEya̍maBi̍ janiśhya̍ iti|̍ tuByamEvEdaṃ̍ hUyAtAq̍ ityabravIt|̍ sa Etad-BAgadhEya̍maBya̍jAyata|̍ yadagnihOtram|̍ 8 (10)

tasmAdagnihOtra-mu̍cyatE|̍ | taddhUyamAna-mAdityO̱&bravIt|̍ mA hauśhIH|̍ uBayOrvai-nAvEtaditi̍|̍ sO̱&gni-rabravIt|̍ kathaM nau# hOśhyantIti|̍ sAqyamEva tuByaM̍ juhavann|̍ prAqtarmahya-mityabravIt|̍ tasmAdagnayE̍# sAqyaṃ hUyatE|̍ sUryAya̍ prAqtaH| | 9 (10)

AqgnEyI vai rAtriH|̍ aindramahaH|̍ yadanuditE̍ sUryE̱ prAqtarjuhuyAt|̍ uBayamEvAgnEyaṅ̍ syA̱t| uditE̍ sUryE̱ prAqtarjuhOti|̍ tathAq&gnayE# sAqyaṃ hUyatE|̍ sUryAya̍ prAqtaH| | rAtriM ~MvA anu# prajAH pra jAyantE|̍ ahnAq prati# tiśhThanti| yathsAqyaM juhOti|̍ 10 (10)

praiva tEna# jAyatE| uditE̍ sUryE̱ prAqtar-juhOti|̍ pratyEva tEna# tiśhThati| | prajApatira-kAmayata̍ prajAyEyEti̍|̍ sa EtadagnihOtraM̍ mithuna-ma̍paśyat|̍ taduditE̍ sUryE&juhOt|̍ yajuśhAq̍ &nyat| tUśhṇImanyat| tatO vai sa prAjAyata|̍ yasyaivaM ~Mviduśha uditE̍ sUryE̱&gnihOtraM juhvati|̍ 11 (10)

praiva jAyatE|̍ athO yathAq divA̱ prajAqnannEti|̍ tAqdRugEva tat| | athO KalvAhuH|̍ yasya vai dvau puṇyau# gRuhE vasataH|̍ yastayOranyaṃ̍ rAqdhayatyanyaM̍ na| uBau vAva sa tAvRucCatIti̍|̍ agniM ~MvAvAdityaH sAqyaM praviśati|̍ tasmAdagnirdUrAnnakta̍M̍ dadRuśE| uBE hi tEjasI̍ sapaMdyEtE|̍ 12 (10)

udyantaM ~MvAvAditya-magniranu# samArOhati|̍ tasmA̱ddhUma EvAgnErdivA# dadRuśE| yadagnayE# sAqyaM juhuyAt|̍ A sUryAya̍ vRuścyEta| yathsUryAya̍ prAqtar-juhuyAt|̍ A&gnayE# vRuścyEta| dEvatA̱ByaH samadaM̍ daddhyAt| agnirjyOtir-jyOtiH sUryaH svAhEtyEva sAqyaṃ hOtavya̱m|̍ sUryO jyOtir jyOtiragniH̍ svAhEti# prAqtaH| tathOBAByAṃ# sAqyaṃ hUyatE|̍ 13 (10)

uBAByA̱M prAqtaH| na dEvatA̱ByaH samadaM̍ dadhAti| | agnirjyOtirityAha|̍ agnirvai rEtOdhAH|̍ | prajA jyOtirityAha|̍ prajA EvAsmai pra janayati|̍ | sUryO jyOtirityAha|̍ prajAsvEva prajAtAsu̍ rEtO# dadhAti| | jyOtiragniH̍ svAhEtyAha|̍ prajA Eva prajAtA̍ asyAM pratiśhThApayati|̍ | 14 (10)

tUśhṇImuttarAq-mAhu̍tiM̍ juhOti| mithunatvAya prajA̱tyai| | yaduditE̍ sUryE̱ prAqtar-juhuyAt|̍ yathA&tithayE̍ pradrutAya̍ śUnyAyAvasathA-yA̍hAqryaṃ̍# haranti|̍ tAqdRugEva tat| kvAha tatastad-BavatItyAhuH|̍ yathsa na vEda|̍ yasmai taddharantIti|̍ tasmAqd-yadauśhasaM̍ juhOti|̍ tadEva sapraMti̍ ( )| athO yathAq prArthamauśhasaM̍ pari̍ vEvE̱śhTi| tAqdRugEva tat| | 15 (12) (amRuśhTa - vicikithsati̍ - juhva# - tyajAmasRuja̍ - tAgnihOtraṃ - sUryAya̍ prAqtar - juhOti - juhvati̍ - saMpadyEtE̍ - hUyatE - sthApayati - saMprati dvE ca)̍ (A2) 2. 1. 3 anuvAkaM 3 - upayOkśhyamAṇasya haviśhaH saMskAraH

rudrO vA EśhaH| yadagniH| patnI̱ sthAqlI| yanmaddhyE&gnE-radhiśrayE̱t|̍ rudrAya patnImapi# daddhyAt| pramAyukA̍ syAt| udIcO&~ggArAnnirUhyAdhi̍# śrayati| patniyai̍ gOpIthAya|̍ | vyantAn̍ karOti| tathAq patnya-pramAyukA̍ Bavati| | 16 (10)

GarmO vA EśhO&śA̱ntaH| aharahaH̍ pravRujyatE|̍ yadagnihOtram|̍ pratiśhi~jcEt̍ paśukAmasya|̍ śAqntamiva̍ hi paśavya̱m|̍ | na pratiśhi~jcEd-brahmavarcasakA̍masya|̍ samiddhamiva̍ hi brahmavarcasam|̍ | athO Kalu|̍ pratiśhicyamEva|̍ yat-pratiśhi~jcati̍|̍ 17 (10)

tat-paśavya̱m|̍ yajjuhOti|̍ tadbrahmavarcasi|̍ uBayamEvAka̍H|̍ | pracyutaM̍ ~MvA EtadasmA-llOkAt| agataM̍ dEvalOkam| yacCRutaṃ haviranaBiGAritam|̍ aBidyOtayati|̍ aByEvaina̍dGArayati|̍ athO# dEvatraivainad-gamayati|̍ | 18 (10)

paryagni̍ karOti| rakśhasAq-mapa̍hatyai|̍ | triH paryagni̍ karOti| tryAvRuddhi̍ yajñaH| athO# mEddhyatvAya|̍ | yat-prAqcIna-mudvAqsayE̱t|̍ yajamAnaṃ̍ śucA &rpayEt|̍ yad-dakśhiṇA|̍ pitRudEvatyaṅ# syAt| yat-pratyak| 19 (10)

patnIṃ# śucA &rpayEt|̍ udIcIna-mudvAsayati|̍ EśhA vai dEvamanuśhyAṇAṃ̍# śAqntA dik| tAmEvainadanUd-vAsayati̍ śAntyai̱| | vartma# karOti| yajñasya saMtatyai|̍ | niśhTapati|̍ upaiva tathstRuṇAti|̍ | caturunnayati|̍ catuśhpAdaH̍ paśavaH|̍ 20 (10)

paśUnEvA-varundhE|̍ | sarvA̱n-pUrṇAnunnayati|̍ sarvE hi puṇyA# rAqddhAH| | anUca unnayati|̍ prajAyA# anUcInatvAya|̍ anUcyEvAsya# prajA &rddhukA̍ Bavati| | saM mRuśati̍ vyAvRuttyai|̍ | nAhO̱śhyannupa# sAdayEt| yadahO̱śhyannupa sAqdayE̱t| yathAq &nyasmA# upanidhAya|̍ 21 (10)

anyasmai̱ prayacCati|̍ tAqdRugEva tat| A&smai# vRuścyEta| yadEva gAṛ hapatyE&dhiśraya̍ti|̍ tEna gAṛ hapatyaM̍ prIṇAti| | agnirabiBEt|̍ AhutayO̍ mA&tyE̱śhyantIti|̍ sa EtAṃ samidha-mapaśyat|̍ tAmA&dhatta|̍ tatO vA agnAvAhutayO&ddhriyanta|̍ 22 (10)

yadEnaṃ̍ samayacCat|̍ tathsamidhaH̍ samittvam| samidhamAdadhAti|̍ samEvainaM̍ ~MyacCati| AhutInAqM̍ dhRutyai̱| athO# agnihOtramEvEddhmavat-karOti|̍ AhutInAqM̍ pratiśhThityai|̍ | brahmavAqdinO# vadanti| yadEkAṃ# samidhamAqdhAya̍ dvE AhutI̍ juhOti|̍ atha kasyAṃ# samidhi# dvitIyAq-mAhutiM̍ juhOtIti|̍ 23 (10)

yad-dvE samidhAvAdaddhyAt|̍ BrAtRuvyamasmai̍ janayEt| EkAṃ# samidhamAqdhAya̍|̍ yajuśhAq̍ &nyAmAhutiM̍ juhOti| uBE Eva samidvatI̍ AhutI̍ juhOti| nAsmai BrAtRuvyaM̍ janayati| | AdI̱ptAyAM juhOti| samiddhamiva̍ hi brahmavarcasam|̍ athO yathA&tithiM̍ jyOtiśhkRutvA̍ parivEvE̱śhTi|̍ tAqdRugEva tat ( )| | caturunnayati|̍ dvirjuhOti|̍ tasmA̱d-dvipA-ccatuśhpAdamatti|̍ athO̱ dvipadyEva catuśhpadaH̍ pratiśhThApayati|̍ | 24 (14) 2. 1. 4 anuvAkaM 4 - upayuktasya haviśhaH saMskAraH

uttarAvatIM̍ ~Mvai dEvA Ahutimaju̍havuH|̍ avAcImasu̍rAH|̍ tatO# dEvA aBavann|̍ parA&surAH|̍ yaM kAqmayEta̍ vasIyAnth̍ syAqditi|̍ kanIyastasya̍ pUrvaṃ# hutvA| uttaraM̍ BUyO# juhuyAt| EśhA vA uttarAvatyAhu̍tiH|̍ tAM dEvA ajuhavuH|̍ tatastE&Bavann|̍ 25 (10)

yasyaivaM juhvati|̍ BavatyEva|̍ | yaM kAqmayEta̍ pApIyAnth̍ syAqditi|̍ BUyastasya pUrvaṃ# hutvA| uttaraM̍ kanIyO̍ juhuyAt| EśhA vA avAqcyAhutiH|̍ tAmasurA̍ ajuhavuH| tatastE parA&Bavann|̍ yasyaivaM juhvati|̍ paraiva Bavati|̍ | 26 (10)

hutvOpa# sAdayatyajAmitvAya|̍ athO vyAvRuttyai|̍ | gAṛ hapatyaM̍ pratI̱kśhatE| ananuddhyAyina-mEvaina̍M̍ karOti| | agnihOtrasya vai sthAqṇurasti|̍ taM ~Mya RucCEt| yajñasthAqṇumRucCEt|̍ Eśha vA agnihOtrasya̍# sthAqṇuH| yat-pUrvA&&hutiH|̍ tAM ~MyaduttarayAq&Bi̍ juhuyAt|̍ 27 (10)

yajñasthAqṇu-mRucCEt|̍ atihAya pUrvAqmAhutiM̍ juhOti| yajñasthAqṇumEva pari# vRuṇakti| athO BrAtRuvyamEvAptvA̍ &tikrAmati|̍ | avAqcInaṃ# sAqyamupa# mArśhTi| rEta# Eva tad-dadhAti|̍ UrddhvaM prAqtaH| pra janayatyEva̍ tat| | brahmavAqdinO# vadanti| caturunnayati|̍ 28 (10)

dvirjuhOti|̍ atha kva# dvE AhutI̍ Bavata iti|̍ agnau vai̱śvAnara iti# brUyAt| Eśha vA agnirvai̱śvAnaraH| yadbrA̱hmaṇaH| hutvA dviH prAśnAti|̍ agnAvEva vai̱śvAnarE dvE AhutI̍ juhOti| | dvirjuhOti|̍ dvirnimA̱rśhTi| dviH prAśnAti|̍ 29 (10)

śhaTth saMpadyantE|̍ śhaDvA RutavaH|̍ RutUnEva prIṇAti|̍ brahmavAqdinO# vadanti| kiM dEvatya-magnihOtramiti̍|̍ vaiśvadEvamiti# brUyAt| yad-yajuśhA̍ juhOti|̍ tadai̱ndrAqgnam| yat-tUśhṇIm| tat-prAjApatyam|̍ 30 (10)
yannimArśhTi|̍ tadOśhadhInAm|̍ yaddvitIya̱m| tat-pitRuṇAm|̍ yat-prAśnAti|̍ tad-garBAṇAm|̍ tasmAqd-garBAq anaśnantO̍ varddhantE| yadAqcAmati|̍ tanmanuśhyA̍ṇAm|̍ | uda~gparyAqvRutyAcA̍mati|̍ 31 (10)

AqtmanO# gOpIthAya|̍ | nirṇEnEkti̍ śuddhyai̱| | niśhTapati̍ svagAkRutyai|̍ ud-diśati|̍ saptaṛ qśhInEva prIṇAti|̍ | dakśhiṇA paryAvartatE|̍ svamEva vIryamanu̍# paryAvartatE|̍ tasmAqd-dakśhiṇO&rddha# AqtmanO# vIryAvattaraH|̍ athO# AdityasyaivAvRutamanu# paryAvartatE|̍ | hutvOpa samindhE|̍ 32 (10)

brahmavarcasasya samiddhyai|̍ | na bara. hiranu pra harEt|̍ asaṅsthitO̍ vA Eśha yajñaH| yadagnihOtram|̍ yadanu̍ praharE̱t| yajñaM ~MvicCindyAt|̍ tasmAqnnAnu# prahRutya̱m| yajñasya santatyai|̍ | apO ni nayati|̍ avaBRuthasyaiva rUpamakaH̍ ( )| | 33 (10) 2. 1. 5 anuvAkaM 5 - kAmyAni hOmadravyAṇi

brahmavAqdinO# vadanti| agnihOtraprAyaṇA̍ yajñAH| kiM prAyaṇa-magnihOtramiti̍|̍ vathsO vA agnihOtrasya̍ prAyaṇam|̍ agnihOtraM ~MyajñAnA̱m| | tasya# pRuthivI sadaH|̍ antarikśha-mAgnI̱ddhram|̍ dyauṛ -havirddhAna̱m|̍ divyA ApaH prOkśhaṇayaH|̍ OśhadhayO̍ bara. hiH| 34 (10)

vanaspataya̍ iddhmaH| diśaH̍ paridhayaH|̍ AqdityO yUpaH|̍ yajamAnaH̍ paśuH| samudrO&vaBRuthaH|̍ sam~MvathsaraH svagAkAqraH|̍ tasmAqdAhitAgnEH̍ sarvamEva̍ barhiśhya̍M̍ dattaM Bavati|̍ yath sAqyaM juhOti|̍ rAtrimEva̍ tEna# dakśhiṇyA̱M kurutE| yat-prAqtaH| 35 (10)

aharEva̍ tEna# dakśhiṇyaM̍ kurutE| yat-tatO dadAti|̍ sA dakśhiṇA|̍ | yAvantO̍ vai dEvA ahutamAdann̍|̍ tE parA&Bavann|̍ ta EtadagnihOtraṃ̍ sarvasyaiva̍ samavadAyA̍juhavuH|̍ tasmAdAhuH|̍ agnihOtraM ~Mvai dEvA gRuhAṇAqM niśhkRuti-mapaśyanniti̍|̍ yath-sAqyaM juhOti|̍ rAtriyA̍ Eva taddhutAdyAya|̍ 36 (10)

yajamAnasyA-pa̍rABAvAya|̍ yat-prAqtaH| ahna# Eva taddhutAdyAya|̍ yajamAnasyA-pa̍rABAvAya|̍ yat-tatO&śnAti|̍ hutamEva tat| | dvayOH payasA̍ juhuyAt-paśukAmasya|̍ EtadvA agnihOtraM̍ mithunam|̍ ya EvaM ~MvEda|̍ pra prajayA# paśuBir-mithunair-jA̍yatE|̍ 37 (10)

imAmEva pUrvayA̍ duhE| amUmuttarayA|̍ adhiśrityOttaramA̍ nayati|̍ yOnAvEva̍ tad-rEtaH̍ si~jcati prajananE|̍ | AjyEna̍ juhuyAqt-tEjaskAmasya|̍ tEjO vA Ajya̱m| tEjasvyEva̍ Bavati|̍ payasA̍ paśukAmasya|̍ Etadvai paśUnAṃ̍ rUpam| rUpEṇaivAsmai# paśUnava# rundhE| 38 (10)

paśumAnEva Bavati|̍ daddhnEndriya kAmasya|̍ indriyaM ~Mvai dadhi|̍ indriyAqvyEva̍ Bavati|̍ yavAqgvA̱ grAmakAmasyauśhadhA̍ vai manuśhyA̱H|̍ BAqgadhEyEnaivAsmai̍# sajAqtAnava-rundhE|̍ grAqmyEva̍ Bavati|̍ | ayajñO̍ vA EśhaH| yOsAqmA|̍ 39 (9)

caturunnayati|̍ caturakśharaṃ̍ rathantaram| rathantarasyaiśha varṇaH|̍ uparIva̍ harati| antarikśhaM̍ ~MvAmadEvyam| vAqmadEvyasyaiśha varṇaH|̍ dvirjuhOti|̍ dvyakśharaM̍ bRuhat| bRuhata Eśha varṇaH|̍ agnihOtramEva tath sAmanvat-karOti|̍ | 40 (10)

yO vA agnihOtrasyO̍pasadO̍ vEda|̍ upainamupasadO̍# namanti| vindata# upasattAra̱m| unnIyOpa# sAdayati| pRuthivImEva prIṇAti|̍ hOśhyannupa# sAdayati| antarikśhamEva̍ prIṇAti|̍ hutvOpa# sAdayati| divamEva̍ prIṇAti|̍ EtA vA agnihOtrasyO̍pasada̍H|̍ 41 (10)

ya EvaM ~MvEda|̍ upaina-mupasadO̍# namanti| vindata# upasattAra̱m| | yO vA agnihOtrasyAśrA̍vitaM̍ pratyAśrAvitaṃq̍ hOtAraM̍ brahmAṇaM̍ ~MvaśhaTkAqraM ~MvEda|̍ tasya tvEva̍ hutam| prAqṇO vA agnihOtrasyAśrA̍vitam|̍ apAqnaH pratyAśrAvitam|̍ manO hOtA̱| cakśhur-brahmA|̍ nimEśhO vaśhaTkAqraH|̍ 42 (10)

ya EvaM ~MvEda|̍ tasya tvEva̍ hutam| | sAqyaM ~MyAvAnaśca̍ vai dEvAH prAtaryAvA̍ṇaścA-gnihOtriṇO̍# gRuhamAgacCanti|̍ tAn. yanna tarpayE̱t| prajayA̱&sya paśuBirvi tiśhThErann|̍ yattarpayE̱t| tRuptA EnaM̍ prajayA# paśuBistarpayEyuH|̍ | sajUrdEvaiH sAqyaM ~MyAvaBiriti̍# sAqyaṃ saM mRuśati|̍ sajUrdEvaiH prAqtaryAvaBiriti̍# prAqtaH| yE caiva dEvAH sAyaM̍ ~MyAvAnO̍ yE ca# prAtaryAvAṇaH|̍ 43 (10)

tAnEvOBayAṅ# starpayati| ta EnaM̍ tRuptAH prajayA# paśuBi# starpayanti| | aruṇO ha# smAqhaupavEśiH|̍ agnihOtra EvAhaṃ sAqyaM prAtarvajraM̍ BrAtRuvyEByaH̍ pra harAmi|̍ tasmAqn-matpApIyAṃsO̍ BrAtRuvyAq̍ iti|̍ caturunnayati|̍ dvirjuhOti|̍ samith-saptamI|̍ saptapadAq̍ śakvarI|̍ śAqkvarO vajraH̍ ( )| agnihOtra Eva tathsAqyaM prAtarvajraM̍ ~MyajamAnO̍ BrAtRuvyAya̍ pra harati|̍ BavatyAqtmanA̱|̍ parA̱&sya BrAtRuvyO̍ Bavati| | 44 (13) 2. 1. 6 anuvAkaM 6 - aByuddravaṇaM, hOmABAvapratIkAraśca

indrO# jAqtO vi purO# rurOja| sa naH̍ paraspA varivaH̍ kRuṇOtu| | ayaM kRutnuragRuBItaH|̍ viśvaji-dudBidith-sOmaH|̍ Ruśhir vipraH kAvyEna|̍ | vAqyuragrEgA̍ yajñaprIH|̍ sAqkaM ganmanasA̍ yajñam| śivO niyudBiH̍ śivABiH|̍ | vAyO# śukrO ayAmi̍ tE| maddhvO agraM diviśhTiśhu|̍ 68 (10)

asmE dyAvApRuthivI̍ BUri# vAqmam| saM duhAthAM̍ GarmaduGEva̍ dhEnuH| ayaṃ rAjA̱ priya indrasya̍ BUyAt| priyO gavAqmOśhadhInA-mutApAm|̍ | yunajmi# ta uttarAvanta-mindra̱m|̍ yEna jayAsi̍ na parAqjayAsai|̍ sa tvA# &karEkavRuśhaBaṅ svAnA̱m| athO# rAjannuttamaM mAnavAnA̱m|̍ | uttarastvamadha̍rE̍ tE sapatnA̱H| EkavRuśhAq̍ indrasaKA̍ jigIvAn| 70 (10)

viśvAq AśAqH pRutanAH̍ sajaMya~jjayann|̍ aBitiśhTha̍ śatrUyataH sahasva|̍ | tuByaM̍ Baranti kśhitayO# yaviśhTha| balimagnE̍ anti# ta Ota dUrAt| A BandiśhThasya̍ sumatiM cikiddhi|̍ bRuhattE# agnE mahi śarma# Badram| | yO dEhyO anamayadvadhasnaiH|̍ yO aryapatnI-ruśhasa̍ścakAra̍|̍ sa niruddhyAq nahuśhO̍ yahvO agniH| viśaścakrE̍ balihRutaH sahOBiH|̍ | 71 (10)

pra sadyO agnE̍ atya̱śhyanyAn| Aqviryasmai cArutarO̍ baBUtha|̍ IDEnyO# vapuśhyO# viBAvA̱| priyO viśAmatithir-mAnu̍śhIṇAm|̍ | brahma# jyEśhThA vIryA# saMBRutAni|̍ brahmAgrE jyEśhThaM divamAtatAna|̍ Rutasya brahma# prathamOta jajñE|̍ tEnAṛ̍ hati brahmaṇAq̍ sparddhituM̍ kaH| | brahma srucO# GRutavatIH|̍ brahmaṇAq̍ svaravO̍ mitAH| 72 (10)

brahma# yajñasya tantavaH|̍ RutvijO yE haviśhkRuta̍H|̍ | śRu~ggAṇIvEcCRu~ggiṇAqṃq̍ saMdadRuśrirE|̍ caśhAlavantaH̍ svaravaH̍ pRuthivyAm| tE dEvAsaH svaravastasthivAṃsa̍H|̍ namaH saKiByaH̍ sannAnmA &vagAta|̍ | aBiBUragniratarad-rajAṃ̍si|̍ spRudhO# vihatya pRutanA̍ aBiśrIH| juśhAqṇO ma AhutiM̍ mA mahiśhTa| hatvA sapatnAqnq. varivaskarannaH̍ ( )| | IśAnaM̍ tvAq BuvanAnA-maBiśriya̱m|̍ staumyagna̍ urukRutaṃ# suvIra̱m| havir juśhAqṇaH̍ sapatnAṃ# aBiBUrasi|̍ jahi śatrUṃqrapa mRudhO# nudasva| | 73 (14) 2. 4. 8 anuvAkaM 8 - upahOmAH

sa pratnavannavI̍yasA|̍ agnE̱ dyumnEna# sam~MyatA̱| bRuhat tatantha BAqnunA̱| | navaM nu stOmamagnayE̱|̍ divaH śyEnAya# jIjanam| vasO̱H kuvidvanAti# naH| | svAqruhA yasya śriyO# dRuśE| rayirvIravatO̍ yathA| agrE# yajñasya cEtataH|̍ | adA̱ByaH pura EtA| 74 (10)

agnirviśAM mAnuśhIṇAm|̍ tUrṇI rathaH sadAq navaH|̍ | navaṃq sOmAya̍ vAqjinE̱| AjyaM payasO&jani|̍ juśhTaṃq śucitamaM̍ ~Mvasu|̍ | navaṃ# sOma juśhasva naH| pIyUśhasyEha̍ tRupṇuhi|̍ yastE# BAqga RutAvayam| | navasya̍ sOma tE vayam| A sumatiM̍ ~MvRuṇImahE|̍ 75 (10)

sa nO# rAsva sahasriṇaH|̍ | navaṃ# havirjuśhasva̍ naH| RutuBiH̍ sOma BUtamam|̍ tada~gga pratiharya̍ naH| rAjana̱th sOma svastayE̱| | navaṅq stOmaM navaṃ# haviH| indrAqgniByAqM nivEdaya|̍ tajjuśhEtAqṃq̍ sacEtasA|̍ | śuciM nu stOmaM navajAtamadya|̍ indrA̱gnI vRutrahaṇA juśhEthA̱m| 76 (10)

uBA hi vAṃ# suhavAq jOhavImi|̍ tA vAjaṃ# sadya uśatE̍ dhEśhThA̱| | agnirindrO navasya̍ naH| asya havyasya# tRupyatAm| iha dEvau sahasriṇau̱|̍ | yajñaM na A hi gacCatAm|̍ vasumantaṃ̍ suvarvida̱m| asya havyasya# tRupyatAm| agnirindrO navasya̍ naH| | viśvA̱n dEvAṅ starpayata|̍ 77 (10)

haviśhO&sya navasya̍ naH| suvarvidO hi jajñirE|̍ | EdaM barq. hiH suśhTarImAq̍ navEna|̍ ayaM ~MyajñO yajamAnasya̍ BAqgaH| ayaM baBUva̍ Buvanasya̍ garBaH|̍ viśvE# dEvA idamadyAgamiśhThAH|̍ | imE nu dyAvApRuthivI̍ samIcI̱| tanvAqnE yajñaM purupEśa̍saM̍ dhiyA| A&smai# pRuṇItAqM BuvanAni̍ viśvA̱| prajAM puśhTimamRutaM̍ navEna|̍ | 78 (10)

imE dhEnU amRutaM ~MyE duhAtE̱| payasva-tyuttarAmE̍tu̍ puśhTiH|̍ imaM ~MyajñaM juśhamAṇE̍ navEna|̍ samIcI dyAvApRuthivI̍ GRutAcI̱| | yaviśhThO̍ havyavAhanaH|̍ citraBAnur-GRutAsu̍tiH|̍ navajAtO̍ virOcasE|̍ agnE tattE# mahitvanam| | tvamagnE̍ dEvatA̱ByaH| BAqgE dEva̍ na mIyasE|̍ 79 (10)

sa EnA̍ vidvAn. yakśhyasi|̍ navaṅq stOmaM̍ juśhasva naH| | agniH prathamaH̍ prAśnAtu|̍ sa hi vEda yathA# haviH| śivA asmaBya-mOśhadhIH|̍ kRuṇOtu# viśvacaṛ̍ śhaṇiH| | BadrAnnaH śrEyaH samanaiśhTa̍ dEvAH| tvayA&vasEna̍ samaśImahi̍ tvA| sa nO# mayOBUH pitO̍ Aviśasva|̍ śaM tOkAya# tanuvE̱ syOnaH ( )| | Etamu tyaM madhunAq̍ sam~MyutaM̍ ~Myava̱m| sarasvatyAq̍ adhimanAva̍carkRuśhuH|̍ indra# AsIth sIrapatiH̍ śatakratuH|̍ kInAśA# Asan marutaH̍ sudAnavaH|̍ | 80 (14) PrapATaka kOrvai with starting words of 1 to 8 anuvAkams :- (juśhTa - ścakśhuśhO̍ - juśhTI# narO - naktaM jAqtA - vRuśhAq sa - uta nO - vRuśhA̱&syaṃqśuH - sa pratnavadaśhTau)̍ kOrvai with starting words of 1, 11, 21 series of :- (juśhTO# - manyur BagO - juśhTI# narO - harivarpasaM̍ giraH - śiprin̍ vAjAnA - muta nO - yad vAgvadantI̍ - viśvAq AśAq aśItiH̍ ) first and last word - 2nd aśhTakam 3rd prapATakam :- (juśhTaH̍ - sudAnavaH̍ )| | hariH̍ OM| | | kRuśhṇa yajurvEdIya taittirIya brAhmaṇE dvitIyAśhTakE caturthaH prapAThakaH samAptaH| | =======================
